page.title: 17A STREET IN BIGGIN HILL
page.content:
HOME LIFE IN BIGGIN HILL
Magnolia Drive is an enjoyable place to live. Most of the children go to Charles Darwin School. Four years ago Magnolia had a street party yo celebrate the royal wedding. Usually you will see all the children from Magnolia playing together. There is a small amount of space to run about, so if it gets too crowded, we all go over to the recreation ground. A girl in our class thinks she would prefer to live in Magnolia than somewhere in the valley. Magnolia Drive is quite busy at twelve noon to the end of the working hours. There was a fight involving the police and their dogs and the boys in Magnolia. The shops that are nearest to us are Biggin Hill Toys and the Pantiles.
